scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Tasha
scrape.text: I once started this book on audio and could not get into it. It stilled nagged at me to get read so I picked it up in ebook format while away on vacation. I had a much better experience with the book and found it really good this time! A bit of a creep factor but in a subtle way. I'm looking froward to reading more by this author.
